name: Solar Explosion
description: This is my very first Ludum Dare jam game, I tried my best to make it as good as possible but I think it lacks in a lot of areas, I didn't have much time to work on this game. This is also one of my first projects I was able to finish and I am really proud of that. Please tell me what you think (Sorry for not including the web version, It was causing me too much trouble)
